we accept BTC only

WHY BTC?

  • we have users round the world, so we look for the most convenient way of payment
  • no bank no problem all you need is an internet access and a crypto wallet
  • btc uses block chain technology, making every transcation cryptographically secure and fraud resistant
  • btc is fast and borderless, no waiting days for bank transfers, bitcoin payments clear in minutes
  • avoid high card processing charges, btc are often lower than paypal or credit card transactions, especially for larger transactions
  • btc gives you more privicy and control over your financial info than most processors

Buy from a Retail or Grocery store cash or transfer or debit:

  • Walmart
  • CVS pharmacy
  • Walgreens
  • Kroger/Ralphs
  • Albertsons/Vons/Safeway

Petrol stations, convenience stores, newsagents with dedicated bitcoin ATM machines

  • Local coin --UK
  • Coin hub --UK
  • 7-Eleven
  • Circle K
  • Chevron & shell
  • Mobil/Exxon

Tips:

  • Fees: buying with cash at a physical store usually carry a high fee (7% to 15%). As a business owner only use this for smaller amounts or emergency, an app like Coinbase, exodus or cashapp
  • Taxes: Keeps your receipts! if you buy bitcoin to pay for something online, those receipts are neccesary for tax deductions

mobile apps like Cashapp, Coinbase, CoinCorner, Revolut app
